Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    org.gjt.sp.jedit.print.BufferPrinter1_3
    org.gjt.sp.jedit.print.BufferPrinter1_4
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    org.gjt.sp.jedit.Debug.ALTERNATIVE_DISPATCHER
    no longer used.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.gjt.sp.jedit.Mode.acceptFilename(String)
    use Mode.acceptFile(String, String) instead
    org.gjt.sp.jedit.GUIUtilities.adjustForScreenBounds(Rectangle)
    use GenericGUIUtilities.adjustForScreenBounds(Rectangle)
    org.gjt.sp.jedit.GUIUtilities.defaultColumnWidth()
    use GenericGUIUtilities.defaultColumnWidth()
    org.gjt.sp.jedit.GUIUtilities.defaultRowHeight()
    use GenericGUIUtilities.defaultRowHeight()
    org.gjt.sp.jedit.GUIUtilities.defaultTableCellSize()
    use GenericGUIUtilities.defaultTableCellSize()
    org.gjt.sp.jedit.bsh.JavaCharStream.getColumn() 
    org.gjt.sp.jedit.Buffer.getFile()
    Do not call this method, use Buffer.getPath() instead.
    org.gjt.sp.jedit.MiscUtilities.getFileNameNoExtension(String)
    use getBaseName() instead.
    org.gjt.sp.jedit.bsh.JavaCharStream.getLine() 
    org.gjt.sp.jedit.textarea.TextArea.getMarkPosition()
    Do not use.
    org.gjt.sp.jedit.GUIUtilities.getParentDialog(Component)
    use GenericGUIUtilities.getParentDialog(Component)
    org.gjt.sp.jedit.GUIUtilities.getScreenBounds()
    use GenericGUIUtilities.getScreenBounds()
    org.gjt.sp.jedit.OperatingSystem.hasJava17()
    - there is no point in checking for this since we require Java 1.8. Returns if Java 2 version 1.7 is in use.
    org.gjt.sp.jedit.GUIUtilities.isAncestorOf(Component, Component)
    use GenericGUIUtilities.isAncestorOf(Component, Component)
    org.gjt.sp.jedit.OperatingSystem.isDOSDerived()
    use OperatingSystem.isWindows()
    org.gjt.sp.jedit.GUIUtilities.isMiddleButton(int)
    use GenericGUIUtilities.isMiddleButton(int)
    org.gjt.sp.jedit.GUIUtilities.isPopupTrigger(MouseEvent)
    use GenericGUIUtilities.requestFocus(Window, Component)
    org.gjt.sp.jedit.GUIUtilities.isRightButton(int)
    use GenericGUIUtilities.isRightButton(int)
    org.gjt.sp.jedit.GUIUtilities.makeSameSize(Component...)
    use GenericGUIUtilities.makeSameSize(Component...)
    org.gjt.sp.util.StandardUtilities.objectsEqual(Object, Object)
    use {java.util.Objects#equals(Object, Object}
    org.gjt.sp.jedit.GUIUtilities.parseColor(String)
    use SyntaxUtilities.parseColor(String, Color)
    org.gjt.sp.jedit.GUIUtilities.parseStyle(String, String, int)
    use SyntaxUtilities.parseStyle(String, String, int, boolean)
    org.gjt.sp.jedit.GUIUtilities.prettifyMenuLabel(String)
    use GenericGUIUtilities.prettifyMenuLabel(String)
    org.gjt.sp.jedit.GUIUtilities.requestFocus(Window, Component)
    use GenericGUIUtilities.requestFocus(Window, Component)
    org.gjt.sp.jedit.io.VFSManager.runInAWTThread(Runnable)
    Using that method, when you run a task in AWT Thread, it will wait for all background task causing some unwanted delays. If you need calling a task after a background work, please add your runnable to the EDT thread yourself at the end of the background task
    org.gjt.sp.jedit.io.VFSManager.runInWorkThread(Task)
    You should not use this method, this threadpool links the AWT Threads and Work threads.
    org.gjt.sp.jedit.GUIUtilities.setAutoMnemonic(AbstractButton)
    use GenericGUIUtilities.setAutoMnemonic(AbstractButton)
    org.gjt.sp.jedit.GUIUtilities.setButtonContentMargin(AbstractButton, Insets)
    use GenericGUIUtilities.setButtonContentMargin(AbstractButton, Insets)
    org.gjt.sp.jedit.GUIUtilities.setEnabledRecursively(Container, boolean)
    use GenericGUIUtilities.setEnabledRecursively(Container, boolean)
    org.gjt.sp.jedit.bsh.NameSpace.setTypedVariable(String, Class, Object, boolean)
    See #setTypedVariable( String, Class, Object, Modifiers )
    org.gjt.sp.jedit.Registers.Register.setValue(String)
    use Registers.Register.setTransferable(java.awt.datatransfer.Transferable) instead, for example setTransferable(new StringSelection(""))
    org.gjt.sp.jedit.GUIUtilities.showPopupMenu(JPopupMenu, Component, int, int)
    use GenericGUIUtilities.showPopupMenu(JPopupMenu, Component, int, int)
    org.gjt.sp.jedit.GUIUtilities.showPopupMenu(JPopupMenu, Component, int, int, boolean)
    use GenericGUIUtilities.showPopupMenu(JPopupMenu, Component, int, int, boolean)
    org.gjt.sp.jedit.textarea.TextArea.showPopupMenu(JPopupMenu, Component, int, int, boolean)
    use GenericGUIUtilities.showPopupMenu(JPopupMenu, Component, int, int, boolean)
